topic.title: [META] Furries Underrepresented
topic.body:
While no accurate data on the fandom's size is present, [adjactive][species]'s data on the convention goers seems to show it's /a lot/. It's also no surprise a lot of us are in tech (no citation here, sorry).

Now, why are there so little members here? in comparison to clearnet, in comparison to other zites.

Is there an actual reason for it? Will the death of 8ch flood the pool with them? Is there just no interest? Are furs just too left?

plz discuss :3

1565103595_15N5Ekv4R4ikiM8YTboS3LgwjuUfr.body: UPDATE: due to the recent news regarding 8chan, there is suddenly an active community on here, wish you all well ^-^
